Āvattagangā：1．āvattagangā．-The name given to the river which，flowing from the southern channel of Anotatta，circles the lake three times before becoming the Kanhagangā．SnA．ii．439，etc．

2．āvattagangā．-A canal which branched off to the south from the Anotattavāpī made by Parakkamabāhu I，evidently called after （1）．Cv．ixxix．50．
